overview.first_pera: As a full-service digital marketing agency, your position will be multifaceted with responsibilities in a number of different operations. Primarily the job is for Google Ads, Microsoft Ads and Social Media Ads accounts management. This job requires statistical data analysis, analytical ability, planning, reporting, and successful campaign optimizations. You’ll be expected to create online advertising campaigns, optimize existing campaigns to increase profitability. You’ll plan, write, create, and design marketing content on a case-by-case basis. You’ll have to ensure all projects under your responsibility are completed on time with the highest level of professionalism and excellence.
overview.second_pera: In addition to your technical skills and industry experience, we’re looking for someone who is highly passionate, motivated, and excited to go above and beyond the call of duty. Also, if you find yourself getting overwhelmed easily and you’ve limitations in multitasking on a regular basis, this position may not be a good fit for you. Dgency provides an amazingly co-operative work culture, where you’ll be surrounded every day by highly creative, talented, and passionate team members.

results.first_pera: The first step was in-depth historical Google Ads data, Analytics data and buyer journey, buyer persona analysis, followed by a complete account restructure.
results.second_pera: Search terms that didn’t convert in the past were no longer relevant to our targeting. It was also critical that campaign-level and ad group level negative keywords were strategically placed throughout the Google Ads account. This ensured that users are flowing through campaigns with the appropriate bids and relevant Google Search and Shopping ads.

overview.first_pera: TRUE BIJOUX opened in 2006 as the sister store to Ottawa’s favorite independent high-end jeweller – Howard Fine Jewellers. Owned and operated by The Jewellery Sisters, Lindsay and Stephanie Appotive.
overview.second_pera: They’re committed to seeking out and offering their customers engagement rings, wedding rings, fine jewelry and fashion jewelry from Canada, the US, and around the globe. They offer various price points and styles, including vintage estate and pre-owned jewelry. There is indeed something for everyone here – Their curated cache of beauty, fashion, contemporary and vintage jewelry is the ultimate jewellery box for particular women and men. Our Dgency team needed to adapt our digital marketing efforts to accommodate their historical branding and buyer persona to our advantage. As a jewellery E-commerce enterprise that heavily relies on their digital advertising efforts, TRUE BIJOUX did not have a lot of margin for error.

market_size.first_pera: The shift to focus only on premium jewelry product lines took our niche jewelry product and shrunk the market size. Our advertised products were no longer going to appeal to users that were making their decision on price alone
market_size.second_pera: The ultimate question, therefore, was to deeply understand the buyer journey and buyer persona. Our team needed to discover why people choose to buy TRUE BIJOUX’s custom-designed jewelry over other jewelers, and how we can leverage this information to expand our customer base and build brand loyalty.

results.first_pera: The first step was in-depth historical Google Ads data, Analytics data and buyer journey, buyer persona analysis, followed by a complete account restructure.
results.second_pera: Search terms that didn’t convert in the past were no longer relevant to our targeting. It was also critical that campaign-level and ad group level negative keywords were strategically placed throughout the Google Ads account. This ensured that users are flowing through campaigns with the appropriate bids and relevant Google Search and Shopping ads.
